
## Eurostat 

Description about the data source. 

```{r}
CLToT <- CL %>%
  filter(CLcatchCat %in% "Lan") %>%
  group_by(CLlanCou, CLyear) %>%
  summarise(CLoffWeight = sum(CLoffWeight, na.rm = TRUE)/1000,
            CLsciWeight = sum(CLsciWeight, na.rm = TRUE)/1000) 

eurostatW <- mutate(eurostatW, 
                    time = as.character(time)) %>%
  add_row(time = max(CL$CLyear), # add the most recent year in the CL even though the eurostat data will not be released by then 
          geo = unique(CL$CLlanCou))

eurostatComp <- left_join(eurostatW, CLToT, by = c("time"  ="CLyear", "geo" = "CLlanCou"))

eurostatComp <- select(eurostatComp, geo:CLsciWeight) %>%
  rename(CLlanCou = geo,
         CLyear =  time, 
         EurostatWeight = values)
```

```{r}
eurostatComp1 <- gather(eurostatComp, WeightSource, Weight, -CLyear, -CLlanCou)
ggplot(eurostatComp1, aes(CLyear, Weight, fill = WeightSource)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  ylab("Landed weight (t)") +
  theme_bw() + 
  theme(text = element_text(size = 20),
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) 
```
